entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
